com.lohika.alp.log4j
Interface TestAppenderBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
TestFileAppender
public interface TestAppenderBuilder

Defines interface to create appenders of the same type for given test methods.

Author:
Mikhail Holovaty

Method Summary
 org.apache.log4j.Appender getAppender(org.testng.ITestResult tr)
          Creates a new Appender to log messages from a test method, which is represented by the given ITestResult
